title: Checking Validity in First Equation
text: Plug the $$x$$ and $$y$$ values of the ordered pair into the inequalities.
speech: Plug the  x  and  y  values of the ordered pair into the inequalities.
pacedSpeech: values of the ordered pair into the inequalities.

title: Solution to the System
text: If the ordered pair makes all of the inequalities in the system true, then it is a solution to the system.
speech: If the ordered pair makes all of the inequalities in the system true, then it is a solution to the system.
